org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.test
Class AeMirroringProcessManager

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.test.AeDelegatingManager
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.test.AeDelegatingProcessManager
          org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.test.AeDelegatingPersistentProcessManager
              org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.test.AeMirroringProcessManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeManager, IAePersistentProcessManager, IAeProcessManager
public class AeMirroringProcessManager
extends AeDelegatingPersistentProcessManager
implements IAePersistentProcessManager

Implements a process manager that mirrors the execution of each process to a new process by replaying the journal entries for the process.

Nested Class Summary
protected  class AeMirroringProcessManager.AeCapturingProcessStateWriter
          Implements a process state writer that captures the journal entries for a process before saving its state.
protected  class AeMirroringProcessManager.AeMirroringWork
          Implements work to replay the journal entries for a process.
